message.name: ERR_ORGUNITPARENTLINK_RV_ORGSTRUCTURE_CANCELED
message.locale: An organization unit cannot be added to a parent organization unit within a canceled organization structure.
An organisation unit cannot be added to a parent organisation unit within a cancelled organisation structure.

message.name: ERR_ORGUNITPARENTLINK_RV_ORGUNIT_CANCELED
message.locale: A canceled organization unit cannot be added to a parent organization unit.
A cancelled organisation unit cannot be added to a parent organisation unit.

message.name: ERR_ORGUNITPARENTLINK_RV_PARENTORGUNIT_CANCELED
message.locale: An organization unit cannot be added to a canceled parent organization unit.
An organisation unit cannot be added to a cancelled parent organisation unit.

message.name: ERR_ORGUNITPARENTLINK_XRV_ORGUNIT_NOT_ASSIGNED
message.locale: This organization unit has not been added to this parent organization unit.
This organisation unit has not been added to this parent organisation unit.

message.name: ERR_ORGUNITPARENTLINK_XRV_ALREADY_CANCELED
message.locale: This organization unit has already been removed from its parent organization unit.
This organisation unit has already been removed from its parent organisation unit.

message.name: ERR_ORGUNITPARENTLINK_XRV_ORGUNIT_ALREADY_ASSIGNED
message.locale: This organization unit has already been added to this parent organization unit.
This organisation unit has already been added to this parent organisation unit.
